metadata.title: CVE-2023-52861 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: drm:bridge: it66121: Fix invalid connector dereference Fix the NULL pointerdereference when no monitor is connected, and the sound card is opened fromuserspace. Instead return an empty buffer (of zeroes) as the EDIDinformation to the sound framework if there is no connector attached.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1003.3').
